description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger A creature you can see damages you with a melee Strike.

You respond with a startled look, dramatic pratfall, or theatrical arm-flailing that stymies your attacker. The attacker must succeed at a Will saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} on a critical failure).

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
